text: Sometimes the first duty of intelligent men is the restatement of the obvious.
author: George Orwell

text: Men who have a pierced ear are better prepared for marriage - they've experienced pain and bought jewelry.
author: Rita Rudner

text: It's absolutely stupid that we live without an ozone layer. We have men, we've got rockets, we've got saran wrap - fix it!
author: Lewis Black

text: Men do less than they ought, unless they do all that they can.
author: Thomas Carlyle

text: The latest research has revealed that women have a higher IQ than men.
author: A. N. Wilson
